QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the law.  For each, please tell me whether you think it is included in the (2010) health reform law, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the health reform law does or does not...create health insurance exchanges or marketplaces where people who don't get coverage through their employers can shop for insurance and compare prices and benefits?
StudyNote: 752 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 751 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 410 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
